name: Leonard Dressup
description:
Leonard Dressup was commissioned by CorruptedChampionStories, featuring their character Leonard Hogan.

View on my website: https://piber.me/games/pibdressupedits/leonarddressup/

Leonard Dressup was made with LÖVE. For more info on the LÖVE project, see: https://love2d.org/
The web-embedded version was made possible by love.js. You can find this project at: https://github.com/Davidobot/love.js
